About Aviothic 2.0

{/* Event Details */}

Event Details

Date
15 October 2025
Time

Venue
Kanpur Institute of Technology
{/* Description */}

What is Aviothic 2.0?

Aviothic 2.0 is an internal hackathon designed to foster innovation, creativity, and collaboration among students. This 24-hour coding marathon challenges participants to build innovative solutions across various technology domains.

Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting your coding journey, Aviothic 2.0 provides the perfect platform to learn, grow, and showcase your technical skills while working on real-world problems.

{/* Aviothic 1.0 History */}

Aviothic 1.0 - Our Journey

Take a look back at the incredible moments from our first hackathon that set the foundation for Aviothic 2.0
